functions.name: assertEqual
functions.description: asserts that two values are equal

functions.name: assertElementsMatch
functions.description: asserts that the specified listA(array, slice...) is equal to specified listB(array, slice...) ignoring the order of the elements. If there are duplicate elements, the number of appearances of each of them in both lists should match.

functions.name: assertJSONEq
functions.description: asserts that two JSON strings are equivalent

functions.name: assertNil
functions.description: asserts that the specified object is nil.

functions.name: assertNotNil
functions.description: asserts that the specified object is NOT nil.

functions.name: assertSubset
functions.description: asserts that the specified list(array, slice...) contains all elements given in the specified subset(array, slice.
